about_the_game:
"Run for the Bus" is a 3D third-person runner game.

The player takes on the role of a hungry girl who overslept in the morning.
Chase her bus while she eats her bread on the colorful roads.
Her bus speed increases as the calendar progresses.
The girl gradually becomes difficult to follow.
Sometimes cats will fall from the sky.
Please avoid.
Will the girl be able to avoid being late?

In the trial version, you can only play the first stage of the game.
detailed_description:
"Run for the Bus" is a 3D third-person runner game.

The player takes on the role of a hungry girl who overslept in the morning.
Chase her bus while she eats her bread on the colorful roads.
Her bus speed increases as the calendar progresses.
The girl gradually becomes difficult to follow.
Sometimes cats will fall from the sky.
Please avoid.
Will the girl be able to avoid being late?

In the trial version, you can only play the first stage of the game.
name: Run for the Bus Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD processor
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Run for the Bus" is a 3D third-person she-runner game. A girl who overslept in the morning runs after the bus she missed. Let her build her strength and chase her bus as she eats the bread.
